summary: The Bet
title: The Bet
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2TEZfNd

by Do_it_with_the_Howell_Lesters

Dan was drunk, he shouldn’t have even considered it but… “How much?”
“£100.” Jack grinned, hiccuping and taking a swig of his beer. “Deal?”

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: If Dan or Phil were in a confirmed relationship with a woman, there would deifnitley be a portion of the phandom who wouldn't...
question: If Dan or Phil were in a confirmed relationship with a woman, there would deifnitley be a portion of the phandom who wouldn't believe it even if they got married and had kids. People would come up with conspiracy theories to explain why its all fake.
answer: And that’s… really damn sad. It’s 2019, everyone should be free to love whoever they want. Regardless of gender.

reblog.comment: And that’s… really damn sad. It’s 2019, everyone should be free to love whoever they want. Regardless of gender.

trail.content_raw: And that’s… really damn sad. It’s 2019, everyone should be free to love whoever they want. Regardless of gender.
trail.content: And that’s… really damn sad. It’s 2019, everyone should be free to love whoever they want. Regardless of gender.

summary: I think the fandom should go on a mission to find Russell Sprout. Just to settle Phil's mind, and who knows maybe reunite Martyn...
question: I think the fandom should go on a mission to find Russell Sprout. Just to settle Phil's mind, and who knows maybe reunite Martyn with his childhood friend.
answer:
That thread was… something.

Could he not just ask Martyn if he had a friend called Russell Sprout? Like, the answer is either going to be “yeah I did” or “I cannot believe you fell for that for 25 years.”

Either way, the answer is a text away from the dumb boy.


Edit: I just saw the rest of the thread. Turns out I was the dumb boy all along.

reblog.comment:

Could he not just ask Martyn if he had a friend called Russell Sprout? Like, the answer is either going to be “yeah I did” or “I cannot believe you fell for that for 25 years.”

Either way, the answer is a text away from the dumb boy.


Edit: I just saw the rest of the thread. Turns out I was the dumb boy all along.

trail.content_raw:
That thread was… something.

Could he not just ask Martyn if he had a friend called Russell Sprout? Like, the answer is either going to be “yeah I did” or “I cannot believe you fell for that for 25 years.”

Either way, the answer is a text away from the dumb boy.


Edit: I just saw the rest of the thread. Turns out I was the dumb boy all along.
trail.content:

Could he not just ask Martyn if he had a friend called Russell Sprout? Like, the answer is either going to be “yeah I did” or “I cannot believe you fell for that for 25 years.”

Either way, the answer is a text away from the dumb boy.


Edit: I just saw the rest of the thread. Turns out I was the dumb boy all along.

trail.content:
~my name is Daniel, I’m the android sent by CyberLife~

———— @danielhowell ————

Reblogs (and likes) are appreciated!

————

Surprised at how quick i was able to do this? Hope you like this one?

Phil’s Android!

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: Outside POV (3) Masterlist
title: Outside POV (3) Masterlist
body:
part one, part two

A Little Street Where Old Friends Meet (ao3) - dizzy

Summary: Jimmy runs into Phil in a Tesco at half eleven on a Thursday night.

A Meeting of Mine (ao3) - Madophelia

Summary: Cornelia’s thoughts on Dan.

Brotherly (ao3) - chiridotalaevis

Summary: Martyn has a text conversation with his mother while on tour.

Cause you’re my best friend, and you’re so good to me (ao3) - Madelasha

Summary: Dan and Phil’s relationship from some of their friend’s points of view.

Different - phananddragonsfics

Summary: He knew those boys were going to be something unalike any other job he’d ever been asked to do…He’d been doing this for a few years; he had an intuition for this kind of thing. / a.k.a. TATINOF through the eyes of Drake the bodyguard

Dyeing the Knot - adorkablephil

Summary: The Lester boys and their partners go on an adventure.

He Makes You Laugh Like I Never Could - bie-lovers

Summary: The beginning of Dan and Phil as experienced by Dan’s girlfriend.

No volcano can stop us now - phinalphantasy7

Summary: Dan and Phil’s plans in April 2010 to holiday in Portugal are spoiled, so they go to Blackpool instead.

She is Happy (ao3) - HappyHoloLady

Summary: When Bella’s parents die, she is adopted by two men named Dan Howell and Phil Lester. She learns to have a family with them and embrace the person she really is.

Stubborn Love - auroraphilealis

Summary: It’s Martyn who goes with Phil to pick out the ring, and it’s Martyn who watches Dan and Phil’s stubbornness nearly cause the whole thing to blow up in their faces. He’d complain if they weren’t so obviously perfect for each other.

Summer Of ‘69 (ao3) - outphan

Summary: Being on a tour bus with Dan and Phil can get interesting for Marianne.

Thicker Than Water - phandomsub

Summary: Daniel isn’t handling his punishment well, and his mother doesn’t understand.

Turn and Face the Strange (ao3) - TortiTabby

Summary: Kathryn Lester starts to feel a change in her youngest towards the end of 2009.

Where The Heart Is (ao3) - andthenshesaid-write

Summary: Two young men have moved into the house across the street and Martha plucks up the courage to go over and welcome them to the neighbourhood.
